name: In re PRIMARY ELECTION OF MAY 21, 1991, FOR the OFFICE OF JUDGE OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LUZERNE COUNTY. Petition of BOARD OF ELECTIONS
name_abbreviation: In re Primary Election of May 21, 1991

judges: NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, J., dissent.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents from the summary disposition of this matter.
parties: In re PRIMARY ELECTION OF MAY 21, 1991, FOR the OFFICE OF JUDGE OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LUZERNE COUNTY. Petition of BOARD OF ELECTIONS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of August, 1991, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the order of the Commonwealth Court dated July 3, 1991, 141 Pa.Cmwlth.Ct. 83, 594 A.2d 870, is vacated.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, J., dissent.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents from the summary disposition of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
597 A.2d 89
In re PRIMARY ELECTION OF MAY 21, 1991, FOR the OFFICE OF JUDGE OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LUZERNE COUNTY. Petition of BOARD OF ELECTIONS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 23, 1991.
